instructions: Take Lisinopril once daily in the morning. Take Aspirin once daily with food. Continue for 30 days and return for follow-up.
Take Metformin twice daily with meals. Monitor blood sugar levels and report any unusual symptoms.
Take Amoxicillin three times daily for infection. Take Ibuprofen as needed for pain, not exceeding 6 tablets per day.
Continue Lisinopril once daily. Monitor blood pressure weekly and maintain log.
Take Aspirin daily for cardiac protection. Take with food to minimize stomach irritation.
Take Ibuprofen as needed for pain relief. Emergency night shift prescription. Continue for 3 days maximum.
Take Amoxicillin three times daily for 7 days. Complete the full course even if symptoms improve.
